net.juniper.smgt.ssp
Class PortalBehaviorFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.juniper.smgt.ssp.PortalBehaviorFactory
public class PortalBehaviorFactory
extends Object

The PortalBehaviorFactory acts as a global fatory to supply the different actions with portal behavior objects.

Also, the PortalBehaviorFactory makes the configured SAEFeatureLocator available for advanced portal actions.

getBehavior

public PortalBehavior getBehavior(String ipAddress,
                                  boolean ignoreUnknownUser)
                           throws net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownUserException,
                                  net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException
Get behavior (model) object for interaction with a Portal User.

Parameters:
ipAddress - Dotted decimal IP address of the Portal User. e.g. "127.0.0.1"
Returns:
A portal behavior object allowing interaction with an active Service Activation Engine responsible for the requested user.
Throws:
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException - No behavior could be instantiated (e.g. when the corresponding engine is not active).
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownUserException

getLocator

public SAEFeatureLocator getLocator()
Get locator object for advanced interaction with a Portal User. The implementation of a model can use the locator to retrieve references to SAEFeatures different to the default "SAEAccess"

Returns:
SAEFeatureLocator the configured feature locator object.
